lottery.title: Win Crypto Lotteries With One USDT
lottery.navTitle: Users can win crypto lotteries just 1 USDT, trusted by the smart contract.
lottery.navTitle1: Users can win crypto lotteries just 1 USDT,

descList.desc1: Blockchain-based smart contract lotteries offer secure and fair play.
descList.desc2: Information cannot be tampered with, ensuring data integrity.
descList.desc3: The drawing information is absolutely fair and just.

lottery.WinUSDT: Win {{number}} USDT reward with just 1 USDT
lottery.BuyDesc: Instructions for participation: By purchasing 1 ticket, you have the chance to win the entire prize pool. The more shares you purchase, the greater the probability of winning the reward pool.
lottery.Unclaimed: You have {{unclaimedPrizes}} USDT waiting for you to claim, Get your bonus now!

referral.Tip1: 1. Share your invite code with friends.
referral.Tip2: 2. Invite friends to sign up and enter your invite code.
referral.Tip3: 3. Receive commission from each friend’s participate.
referral.YourCommissionDesc: Your friends have invested, these are the commission you deserve！
referral.GetCodeFail: Failed to generate invitation code! Please try again!

tutorials.StepDesc2: Purchase at least one share to participate.
tutorials.StepDesc3: Waiting for the lottery draw to get the big prize.

QAs.title1: 1. How much reward can l receive?
QAs.title2: 2. How to increase the probability of receiving rewards?
QAs.title3: 3. How do l verify that the draw is fair and impartial?
QAs.title4: 4. How do l view and claim my rewards?
QAs.title5: 5. How to get rewards for inviting friends?
QAs.desc1: Purchase just 1 share, you have the chance to win the entire prize pool.
QAs.desc2: The more shares you purchase, the greater the probability of receiving rewards.
QAs.desc3: The lottery rules are written in the smart contract, and you can verify it in the smart contract address we published.
QAs.desc4: You can view and claim your rewards in [My reward], and you will need to pay gas fees when claiming them.
QAs.desc5: For every share purchased by a friend you invite, you will receive a 3% commission from the purchase amount.

header.hadRegister: Already registered, cannot bind invitation code！
header.JoinUsDesc: Get an invite code from an existing user to bind an invitation relationship.

footer.Email: For any inquiries, contact us at support@1usdt.io
